title: Innovative Thinking Development Program for Pharmaceutical Entrepreneurs

context.prior_knowledge: Basic pharmaceutical knowledge and management career experience
context.additional_context: Customized education for corporate managers to strengthen pharmaceutical-based entrepreneurial competencies.

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three new business opportunities in the pharmaceutical field through VR simulations
Learners can design innovative drug management models leveraging existing knowledge through Bloom’s Taxonomy-based task performance
By applying the KSAs acquired from the Delphi technique workshop, one can complete a project proposal for personalized medication services.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
